attributes.action: allow the debate on the No Confidence motion in Speaker Michael Martin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Speaker Michael Martin has lost the confidence of the public and many MPs in Parliament.

In refusing to allow Parliamentary time for a debate on the no-confidence motion in the Speaker, Gordon Brown is complicit in maintaining the Speaker in role, despite protesting it is a matter for Parliament and the Commons.

If it is genuinely a matter for Parliament, the Prime Minister should find the time for Parliament to debate it!

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
